message.body: Grandpa, when are you rolling into town?
Early tomorrow morning
Oof, when are you taking off?
I'm pretty sure we're staying the whole day. Neil's hanging with Pippi and the rest of the band have places they can go
Dig, well I work during the day... Until 4 or so. I can leave for a while though. Or I'm available after?
I'll text you when we're all settled in and see where you are jive turkey.
Just got here. Gonna sleep while you finish your shift. I feel like death.
Oh man ringo. Let me know when you're rested up. I'll go easy on you.
You're gonna beat me up.
Who told you about the sneak attack?!
I had a vision whilst listening to Nina Simone.
Sleep Skidmore
Work Stuckey.
What's your work address?
Parking is impossible so you should get dropped off if you are...
No, I wouldn't intrude at work, i was trying to see how close you are. I'm next to Lake Calhoun. You're about 3 miles away
Oh I live like 6 blocks from lake calhoun
What's that address and I'll meet you there
I'll start walking then. I'm bout a mile away.
Cool. Enjoy Minneapolis!
Behind a bus :( on my way!
